content.text:
# MG Music Awards

| network        =
| website        =
}}
The MG Music Awards  is an annual music awards show presented by the Musicians Guild Nagaland. The annual ceremony was first held over a virtual ceremony on 21 June 2021.
Ceremonies

|-

! scope="col" |

| colspan="2" |Online event

Categories
*Best Electronic Artist
*Best Folk Fusion
*Best Gospel Artist
*Best Hip Hop Artist
*Best Indie Artist
*Best Music Video
*Best Pop Duo/Group
*Best Pop Female
*Best Pop Male
*Best Rock Artist
*Best Song of the Year
*Best Sound Engineer
